content:
A few months ago the Django project (A python web-framework) opened a new proposal to completely change and decentralise their governance model. I think this would be interesting to a lot of people here.

Blog post: https://www.djangoproject.com/weblog/2020/mar/12/governance/
RFC: https://github.com/django/deps/blob/master/accepted/0010-new-governance.rst
